projects.title: Full Bathroom Renovation
projects.description: Complete bathroom transformation with walk-in shower, 3D feature tiles, and ambient LED lighting.
projects.fullDescription: A dated bathroom converted into a modern, spa-inspired space. We removed the old bathtub and installed a spacious frameless glass walk-in shower with 3D wave pattern feature tiles. The room features vertical blue LED ambient lighting, a wall-hung toilet with concealed cistern, and a floating vanity unit. Finished with a chrome heated towel rail, recessed spotlights, and dark gray floor tiles throughout.

projects.title: Restaurant Interior Renovation and Fit-Out
projects.description: Full interior renovation featuring gold mosaic counter, herringbone flooring, and decorating.
projects.fullDescription: Complete interior fit-out for a restaurant in Kenton. We built a custom service counter clad in gold hexagonal mosaic tiles with a white worktop. Laid herringbone flooring throughout the space. Painted walls and ceiling, and installed all lighting including wall sconces, pendant chandelier, and ring ceiling light. A warm, inviting space ready for customers.

projects.title: Loft Bathroom
projects.description: Loft bathroom with marble-effect tiling, walk-in shower, underfloor heating, and skylight.
projects.fullDescription: New bathroom fitted in a loft space in Barnet. We tiled the floor and walls with marble-effect porcelain tiles, working around the sloped ceiling. Installed a walk-in shower enclosure with rainfall showerhead and handheld shower. Fitted a wall-hung toilet with brass flush plate, white vanity unit with basin, and chrome heated towel rail. Built a custom storage cupboard under the eaves. Full plumbing and underfloor heating installation. Natural light from the Velux skylight.

A complete transformation of an outdated kitchen into a stunning modern cooking space. We installed custom-built cabinets, quartz worktops, and integrated appliances. The open-plan design now flows seamlessly into the dining area, creating a perfect space for family gatherings and entertaining.
projects.title: Modern Kitchen Renovation
projects.description: Complete kitchen redesign with custom cabinetry and worktops

projects.fullDescription: This loft conversion added a luxurious master suite to the property, complete with a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom. We installed Velux skylights to flood the space with natural light, and the dormer extension maximised headroom. Full insulation and underfloor heating ensure year-round comfort.
projects.title: Loft Conversion Master Suite
projects.description: Spacious loft conversion with skylights and en-suite bathroom

projects.fullDescription: This rear extension transformed a cramped kitchen into a stunning open-plan living space. Bi-fold doors open onto the garden, blurring the line between indoor and outdoor living. The extension includes a contemporary kitchen, dining area, and family room, with skylights providing abundant natural light throughout.
projects.title: Rear House Extension
projects.description: Open-plan living extension with bi-fold doors

projects.fullDescription: A complete commercial fit-out for a growing business, featuring open-plan workspaces, private meeting rooms with glass partitions, and a welcoming reception area. We installed suspended ceilings, LED lighting, and a modern HVAC system. The design promotes collaboration while providing quiet spaces for focused work.
projects.title: Office Fit-out
projects.description: Modern open-plan office space with glass partitions

projects.fullDescription: By building out into the side return, we created a significantly larger kitchen and dining space. A large rooflight runs the length of the extension, flooding the room with natural light. The result is a bright, airy kitchen that has become the heart of the family home.
projects.title: Side Return Extension
